solution_line_template: Merry had a total of {boxes_saturday} + {boxes_sunday} = <<{boxes_saturday}+{boxes_sunday}={total_boxes}>>{total_boxes} boxes of apples.
These {total_boxes} boxes is equal to {total_boxes} x {apples_per_box} = <<{total_boxes}*{apples_per_box}={total_apples_initial}>>{total_apples_initial} apples.
Thus, {apples_left}/{apples_per_box} = <<{apples_left}/{apples_per_box}={boxes_left}>>{boxes_left} boxes of apples are left.
